page.title: 04Chapel Old School
page.content: When we were at the old school the classrooms were mobiles,but Mrs Bees class was made with sheets of metal.We did not have assembly.We had to go into a classroom.We kept our P.E. equipment in a shed.There was not a dinner hall so we had to have our dinner in our classrooms.The toilets were not in the classrooms they were at the other side of the playground.There were no taps in our classrooms you had to go to the brickroom to wash your brushes after using them.There was a little kitchen and there was not a staffroom.The teachers had coffee in the office.There was a bike shed and quite a big playground and field.
